name: Tex Murphy: Mean Streets

write_file.content:
[sdl]
sensitivity=20
[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
C:
cd mean
ms.exe
exit

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select GOG installer
- inno: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/mean-streets.conf
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      find "$src" -type f \( -iname "*.ACC" -o -iname  "MS.EXE" -o -iname  "MS._XE"
      -o -iname "*.pdf" \) -exec cp {} "$dst" \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $inno
- execute:
    args: -I app -d "$CACHE" "$game"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/HDD $GAMEDIR/HDD/mean
    file: mkdir
- execute:
    args: $CACHE/app $GAMEDIR/HDD/mean
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- write_file:
    content: '[sdl]

      sensitivity=20

      [autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      C:

      cd mean

      ms.exe

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/mean-streets.conf
